merit_scholarships.name: Danforth Scholars Program
merit_scholarships.amount: Full tuition + $2,500 stipend, or half tuition
merit_scholarships.description: Flagship merit scholarship recognizing leadership in service, intellectual creativity, and commitment to diversity. Separate application required (Jan 3 deadline).

merit_scholarships.name: John B. Ervin Scholars Program
merit_scholarships.amount: Full tuition + $2,500 stipend, or half tuition
merit_scholarships.description: Merit scholarship for students demonstrating academic excellence, leadership, and community service. U.S. citizens/permanent residents/DACA eligible. Separate application required.

merit_scholarships.name: Annika Rodriguez Scholars Program
merit_scholarships.amount: Full tuition + $2,500 stipend, or half tuition
merit_scholarships.description: Merit scholarship for students passionate about bringing diverse cultures together. Open to international students. Separate application required.

merit_scholarships.name: Langsdorf Fellowships (Engineering)
merit_scholarships.description: Up to 10 incoming McKelvey School of Engineering students. No separate application required.

merit_scholarships.name: Distinguished Scholars (Olin Business)
merit_scholarships.description: Up to 10 incoming Olin Business School students. No separate application required.

merit_scholarships.name: Ampersand Scholarships (Arts & Sciences)
merit_scholarships.description: Up to 16 incoming Arts & Sciences students spanning multiple academic areas. No separate application required.
